abstract: A top banker at HSBC has left the firm after two years to join J.P. Morgan Chase‘s financial sponsors group, according to an internal memo at J.P. Morgan.
lead_paragraph: A top banker at HSBC has left the firm after two years to join J.P. Morgan Chase‘s financial sponsors group, according to an internal memo at J.P. Morgan.

headline.main: J.P Morgan Woos Top U.S. Banker From HSBC
